alert.note: Alert for Central Aleutians (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 08 at 5:42AM AKST until February 09 at 7:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 35 to 55 mph with gusts up to 85 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Aleutians. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Peak winds are expected late Thursday morning through Thursday afternoon as a strong low and associated front move across the Central Aleutians. Significant reductions in visibility are possible in blowing snow. However, there remains some uncertainty with how quickly snow will transition to rain.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Prepare for the possibility of widespread power outages. Use caution if you must travel.
